title: "DeepMind’s AI Makes Gigantic Leap in Solving Protein Structures"
excerpt: "D structure of proteins, such as this one of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein, has long been a goal of biology. Credit:  An artificial intelligence (AI) network developed by Google AI offshoot DeepMind has made a gargantuan leap in solving one of biology’s grandest challenges — determining a protein’s 3D shape from its amino-acid sequence."
